gricean_maxims.cooperative_principle: Be cooperative in conversation towards a shared goal.

maxims.name: Quantity
maxims.instruction: Provide necessary information, but no more than required.

maxims.name: Quality
maxims.instruction: Be truthful; do not state falsehoods or unsupported claims.

maxims.name: Relation
maxims.instruction: Be relevant to the current topic of conversation.

maxims.name: Manner
maxims.instruction: Be clear, brief, orderly, and avoid ambiguity/obscurity.
